owner.name: Xule Lin and Kevin Corley (Imperial College London)

plugins.name: interpretive-orchestration
plugins.description: Full version for Claude Code CLI. Features Socratic onboarding, 4-stage reflexive coding, MCP tools (Sequential Thinking, Lotus Wisdom), hooks, and specialized agents.

plugins.name: interpretive-orchestration-cowork
plugins.description: Cowork-compatible version. Commands and skills for qualitative research without MCP servers (works in Claude Desktop's sandboxed environment).
